}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The '''[[Intel]]''' logo, "StP2 C0 NGFF 4L TF6", and "PB#H35123-001" :is silkscreened on the card in the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2512752 FCC photos].
''MSI'' GE72 6QF - 3165NGW used
* '''Intel Dual Band Wireless-AC 3165 (3165NGW)''' (2015) Stone Peak 1 (1x1) :''Intel Dual Band Wireless-AC 3165'' (Key A,E) [https://www-ssl.intel.com/content/www/us/en/wireless-products/dual-band-wireless-ac-3165.html PPage], [https://www-ssl.intel.com/content/dam/www/public/us/en/documents/product-briefs/dual-band-wireless-ac-3165-brief.pdf PBrief] :802.11аbgn/ac, 1x1, 2.4/5 GHz (Dual Band), 433 Mbps, Bluetooth 4.2 ::3165NGW - 802.11ac, 1x1, Bluetooth 4.2, PCIe, USB, M.2 2230 ::[https://fccid.io/PD93165NGU FCC ID: PD93165NGU] (01/26/2015) ::[https://fccid.io/PD93165NG FCC ID: PD93165NG] (04/03/2015) :Device: [http://pci-ids.ucw.cz/read/PC/8086/3165 8086:3165] (3.17), 8086:3165 [http://www.driverlookup.com/hardware-id/pci/ven_8086&dev_3165], 8086:3166 [http://www.driverlookup.com/hardware-id/pci/ven_8086&dev_3166] * ::IWL_PCI_DEVICE(0x3165, 0x4010, iwl3165_2ac_cfg) [http://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/iwlwifi/iwlwifi-fixes.git/tree/drivers/net/wireless/intel/iwlwifi/pcie/drv.c git] ::IWL_PCI_DEVICE(0x3165, 0x4012, iwl3165_2ac_cfg) ::IWL_PCI_DEVICE(0x3165, 0x4110, iwl3165_2ac_cfg) ::IWL_PCI_DEVICE(0x3166, 0x4210, iwl3165_2ac_cfg) ::IWL_PCI_DEVICE(0x3166, 0x4212, iwl3165_2ac_cfg) ::IWL_PCI_DEVICE(0x3166, 0x4310, iwl3165_2ac_cfg) ::IWL_PCI_DEVICE(0x3165, 0x4410, iwl3165_2ac_cfg) ::IWL_PCI_DEVICE(0x3165, 0x4510, iwl3165_2ac_cfg) ::IWL_PCI_DEVICE(0x3165, 0x8010, iwl3165_2ac_cfg) ::IWL_PCI_DEVICE(0x3165, 0x8110, iwl3165_2ac_cfg) :Subsystem: 8086:4010, 8086:4210 ([http://pci-ids.ucw.cz/read/PC/8086/3165 pci-id base]) ::8086:4010 Dual Band Wireless AC 3165 Stone Peak 1x1 ::8086:4210 Dual Band Wireless AC 3165 Stone Peak 1x1 * [[Intel Dual Band Wireless-AC 3165 (3165D2WG)]] (2015) Stone Peak 1 (1x1) :''Intel Dual Band Wireless-AC 3165'' (2015) [https://www-ssl.intel.com/content/www/us/en/wireless-products/dual-band-wireless-ac-3165.html PPage], [https://www-ssl.intel.com/content/dam/www/public/us/en/documents/product-briefs/dual-band-wireless-ac-3165-brief.pdf PBrief] :802.11аbgn/ac, 1x1, 2.4/5 GHz (Dual Band), 433 Mbps, Bluetooth 4.2 ::3165D2WG - 802.11ac, 1x1, Bluetooth 4.2, PCIe, USB, M.2 1216 (3.3V) ::3165D2WG - 802.11ac, 1x1, Bluetooth 4.2, PCIe, USB, M.2 1216 (1.8V)
